description.english: Shoot one of every organ
description.french: Tirer sur chaque organe une fois
description.italian: Spara a ogni organo
description.koreana: 모든 장기를 한 번 이상 맞추세요
description.spanish: Dispara una vez como mínimo a cada órgano.
description.japanese: 全ての臓器を1回ずつ狙撃する
description.brazilian: Atire em cada órgão

description.english: Kill an enemy at a distance of over 200m
description.german: Töte einen Feind auf über 200 m Entfernung
description.french: Tuer un ennemi sur une distance de plus de 200 m
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico da una distanza di oltre 200 m
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo desde una distancia de más de 200 metros.
description.schinese: 在超过200m的距离击杀一个敌人
description.tchinese: 擊殺超過 200 米以外的敵人
description.japanese: 200m以上の距離から敵を1体仕留める
description.brazilian: Elimine um inimigo a uma distância de mais de 200m
description.russian: Убейте врага с расстояния свыше 200 м

displayName.english: One bullet is all it takes

description.english: Kill more than one enemy by blowing up TNT with a rifle shot
description.german: Töte mehr als einen Feind durch Detonieren von TNT durch einen Gewehrschuss
description.french: Tuer plus d’un ennemi en faisant sauter de la TNT avec un tir de fusil
description.italian: Uccidi più di un nemico facendo saltare in aria gli esplosivi con un colpo di fucile
description.koreana: 소총 사격으로 TNT를 터뜨려서 적 두 명 이상을 처치하세요
description.spanish: Revienta la dinamita con un disparo de rifle y mata a más de un enemigo.
description.schinese: 用步枪射击引爆TNT炸药，击杀不止一个敌人
description.tchinese: 以步槍射擊射爆 TNT 來擊殺多於一個敵人
description.japanese: ライフル狙撃でTNTを爆破させて、敵を複数爆死させる
description.brazilian: Elimine mais de um inimigo explodindo TNT com um tiro de rifle
description.polish: Zabij co najmniej 2 wrogów, wysadzając dynamit strzałem z karabinu
description.russian: Убейте более одного врага, подорвав динамит выстрелом из винтовки

description.english: Complete the game on Sniper Elite difficulty
description.french: Terminer le jeu en difficulté Authentique
description.italian: Completa il gioco al livello di difficoltà Autentico

description.japanese: 難易度「オーセンティック」でゲームをクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ grę na autentycznym poziomie trudności
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo na dificuldade

description.japanese: カスタム装備編成を設定する
description.brazilian: Defina um conjunto de equipamentos personalizado

description.english: Complete a mission without blowing cover
description.german: Schließe die Mission ab, ohne das deine Tarnung auffliegt
description.french: Terminer la mission sans révéler sa couverture
description.italian: Completa la missione senza far saltare la copertura
description.spanish: Completa la misión sin reventar ninguna cobertura.
description.schinese: 在不被炸翻的情况下完成任务
description.tchinese: 在沒有被發現的情況下完成任務
description.japanese: 敵に一度も気づかれることなくミッションをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua a missão sem ser descoberto
description.polish: Ukończ misję, nie dając się wykryć

description.brazilian: Conclua um Desafio de Armas

description.english: Set a weapons range score in the Resistance Base
description.german: Erreiche eine Punktzahl am Schießstand der Basis des Widerstands

description.polish: Pobij rekord na strzelnicy w bazie ruchu oporu
description.russian: Поставьте рекорд дальности стрельбы из оружия на базе сопротивления

displayName.japanese: 腕を上げるには実践のみ

description.english: Complete all 3 firing ranges
description.french: Terminer les 3 stands de tir

description.spanish: Completa los 3 campos de tiro.
description.japanese: 3つの射撃場全てをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os 3 campos de tiro

description.english: Score 3 kill shots in 8.3 seconds with the Carcano at a distance of at least 81m
description.german: Erziele mit dem Carcano in 8,3 Sekunden 3 Kill-Schüsse über eine Distanz von mindestens 81 m
description.french: Faites 3 tirs mortels en 8,3 secondes avec le Carcano à une distance d’au moins 81 m
description.italian: Realizza 3 uccisioni in 8,3 secondi con il Carcano da una distanza di almeno 81 m.
description.koreana: 최소 81m 이상 떨어진 거리에서 카르카노로 8.3초 안에 3 킬을 기록하세요
description.spanish: Logra 3 muertes en 8,3 segundos con el Carcano desde una distancia mínima de 81 metros.
description.schinese: 在至少81m的距离用卡尔卡诺步枪在8.3秒内获得3次射杀
description.tchinese: 以卡爾卡諾從最少 81 米的距離在 8.3 秒內擊殺 3 次
description.japanese: Carcanoを使って、81m以上の距離から8.3秒以内に3キルを決める
description.brazilian: Execute 3 disparos fatais em 8,3 segundos usando o Carcano a uma distância de pelo menos 81m
description.polish: Korzystając z Caracano, zabij 3 wrogów z co najmniej 81 m w ciągu 8,3 s
description.russian: Совершите 3 убийства с помощью Каркано за 8,3 с с расстояния не менее 81 м

description.english: Score a kill shot with every bullet in the magazine of a rifle
description.german: Erziele mit jeder Kugel im Magazin eines Gewehrs einen Kill-Schuss
description.french: Faites un frag avec chaque balle du magasin d’un fusil
description.italian: Realizza un'uccisione con ogni proiettile nel caricatore di un fucile
description.koreana: 소총의 탄창에 든 모든 탄환으로 킬 샷을 기록하세요
description.spanish: Logra una muerte con cada bala del cargador de un rifle.
description.schinese: 用步枪弹匣中的每一发子弹进行致命一击
description.tchinese: 將步槍彈匣中的每一發子彈全部用於擊殺
description.japanese: ライフルのマガジンに入っている全弾で、一度も外すことなくキルを決める
description.brazilian: Execute um disparo fatal com cada uma das balas no carregador de um rifle
description.polish: Zabij wroga każdym pociskiem w magazynku karabinu
description.russian: Совершите убийство, используя каждую пулю магазина винтовки

displayName.japanese: コラテラル・ダメージ

description.english: Kill 3 enemies with a single explosion
description.german: Töte 3 Feinde mit einen einzigen Explosion
description.french: Tuer 3 ennemis avec une seule explosion
description.italian: Uccidi 3 nemici con un'unica esplosione
description.spanish: Mata a 3 enemigos con una misma explosión.
description.schinese: 用一次爆炸击杀3个敌人
description.tchinese: 用一次爆炸殺死 3 個敵人
description.japanese: 1回の爆発で敵を3体殺す
description.brazilian: Elimine 3 inimigos com uma única explosão

description.english: Kill a Sniper with an eye shot
description.german: Töte einen Scharfschützen mit einem Augenschuss
description.french: Tuer un sniper par un tir à l’œil
description.italian: Uccidi un cecchino con un colpo all'occhio
description.spanish: Mata a un francotirador de un tiro en el ojo.
description.schinese: 用爆眼击杀一个狙击手
description.japanese: 目を撃ち抜いてスナイパーを1人始末する
description.brazilian: Elimine um atirador com um tiro no olho

description.english: Kill an enemy immediately after staggering them with a thrown environmental object
description.german: Töte einen Feind, sofort nachdem du ihn mit einem Objekt aus der Umwelt zum Taumeln gebracht hast
description.french: Tuer un ennemi immédiatement après l’avoir étourdi avec un projectile pris dans l’environnement
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico subito dopo averlo fatto vacillare lanciando un oggetto dell'ambiente
description.koreana: 환경 사물을 투척해서 적을 당황시키고 즉시 그 적을 처치하세요
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo justo después de aturdirlo tirándole un objeto del entorno.
description.schinese: 用投掷的环境物体使敌人摇晃，随后立即将其击杀
description.tchinese: 擲出環境物體令敵人吃驚後，立即擊殺一個敵人
description.japanese: 投げたオブジェクトに敵が驚いた直後に、その敵を仕留める
description.brazilian: Elimine um inimigo imediatamente após atordoá-lo com um objeto arremessado
description.polish: Zabij wroga natychmiast po ogłuszeniu go za pomocą rzuconego obiektu otoczenia
description.russian: Бросьте во врага предмет окружения и сразу же убейте его

description.english: Kill the German General from the church with a non-scoped weapon
description.german: Töte den deutschen General mit einer Waffe ohne Zielfernrohr aus der Kirche heraus
description.french: Tuer le général allemand depuis l’église avec une arme sans lunette
description.italian: Uccidi il generale tedesco dalla chiesa con un'arma senza mirinon
description.koreana: 교회에서 조준경 없는 무기로 독일군 장군을 처치하세요
description.spanish: Mata al general alemán desde la iglesia con una arma sin mira.
description.schinese: 用无瞄准镜的武器从教堂击杀德国将军
description.tchinese: 以無瞄準鏡的武器從教堂殺死德軍將軍
description.russian: Убейте немецкого генерала из церкви оружием без прицела
description.japanese: スコープ無しの武器で、教会からドイツ軍将軍を殺す
description.polish: Będąc w kościele, zabij niemieckiego generała za pomocą broni bez lunety
description.brazilian: Elimine o general alemão da igreja usando uma arma sem luneta

displayName.french: Les graines de sa propre destruction
displayName.brazilian: A semente de sua própria destruição

description.english: Shoot the grenade on an enemy belt
description.german: Schieße einem Feind eine Granate vom Gürtel
description.french: Tirer sur une grenade située sur la ceinture d’un ennemi
description.italian: Spara a una granata attaccata alla cintura del nemico
description.koreana: 적의 벨트에 달려 있는 수류탄을 명중시키세요
description.spanish: Dispara a una granada que tenga un enemigo en el cinturón.
description.schinese: 射击敌人腰带上的手榴弹
description.tchinese: 射擊敵人腰帶上的手榴彈
description.japanese: 敵のベルトに付いている手榴弾を狙い撃ちする
description.brazilian: Atire em uma granada no cinto de um inimigo
description.polish: Strzel w granat przy pasie wroga

description.english: Kill an enemy with a ricochet shot
description.german: Töte einen Feind mit einem Querschläger
description.french: Tuer un ennemi par un tir ricochet
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico con un colpo di rimbalzo
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo con un tiro de rebote.
description.schinese: 通过反弹射击击杀一名敌人
description.japanese: 跳弾で敵を1体殺す
description.brazilian: Elimine um inimigo com um tiro de ricochete

description.english: Hit both testicles with a single bullet
description.german: Triff beide Hoden mit einer einzigen Kugel
description.french: Toucher les deux testicules avec une seule balle
description.italian: Colpisci entrambi i testicoli con un unico proiettile
description.koreana: 하나의 탄환으로 고환 두 개를 모두 명중시키세요
description.spanish: Dale a ambos testículos con una misma bala.
description.schinese: 用一颗子弹击中整个下体
description.tchinese: 以一發子彈擊中兩顆睾丸
description.japanese: 1発の弾丸で両方の睾丸をヒットする
description.brazilian: Acerte os dois testículos com uma única bala
description.russian: Попадите в оба яичка одной пулей

description.english: Complete a mission on Sniper Elite difficulty without dying while also reaching near death status
description.german: Schließe eine Mission auf Schwierigkeitsgrad Sniper Elite, ohne zu sterben, und erreiche dabei außerdem den Status Nahtod
description.french: Terminer une mission en difficulté Sniper Elite en frôlant la mort mais sans mourir
description.italian: Completa una missione in difficoltà Sniper Elite aggiungendo anche la condizione quasi morte
description.koreana: 스나이퍼 엘리트 난이도에서 거의 사망 직전까지 갔다가 결국 죽지 않고 미션을 완료하세요
description.spanish: Completa una misión en dificultad Francotirador de élite sin morir pero estando a punto.
description.schinese: 完成狙击精英难度度的任务，没有阵亡但接近死亡
description.tchinese: 在「狙擊精英」難度的任務中,與瀕死狀態完成任務,期間不可死亡
description.russian: Выполните задание на сложности «элитный снайпер», не умерев, но достигнув предсмертного состояния
description.japanese: 「スナイパーエリート」の難易度で、瀕死の状態になりながらも死なずにミッションを1つクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ misję na poziomie snajper, nie umierając, ale będąc blisko śmierci
description.brazilian: Conclua uma missão no nível de dificuldade Atirador de Elite sem morrer, mas chegando perto
